page.title: 17FAMILY LIFE
page.content: My father is a solicitor.He starts work in Shrewsbury at 8.40am.My mother is a housewife.She gets my baby sister up at 8.45am when I go to school.My father goes home for lunch.I leave school at 3.30pm and usually play at home until tea at 5.15pm. After tea we play upstairs.My father comes home at 6.30pm.My mother puts my baby sister to bed at 7.00pm and then makes me go to bed. My mother and father go to bed at 11.00pm.In the winter and summer holidays we sometimes go to our house on the coast of North Wales.My mother usually shops at a supermarket four miles away.Her latest shopping list contained -6 bananas 97p,fruit cake 79p,1/4lb mushrooms 29p,1lb tomatoes 65p,6 oranges 90p and 1 large wheatmeal loaf 50p.
